title: 如何用指令给予玩家拉满的弩?急!!!
author: yuan_su_
txt_content: 如何用指令给予玩家拉满的弩?急!!!

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
give @p minecraft:crossbow{ChargedProjectiles:[{id:"minecraft:firework_rocket",Count:1b,tag:{Fireworks:{Explosions:[{Type:4}]}}}],Charged:1b} 1复制代码
这是例子，差别是把前面的arrow替换成了firework_rocket和其对应的烟花nbt
